title: Bug 120315: Display Property 'none' Not Taking Effect in New PDF Emitter
OB: The label remains visible in the PDF despite setting the display property of the item to 'none' in the new PDF emitter.
EB: Preview in PDF. Expected result: the label should disappear.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'Properties' view.
3. Set 'sectionDisplay' as 'none'.
4. Generate the PDF and observe the visibility of the label.
